SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.cli

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.cli.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewInterface
public class CLI extends Object implements ViewInterface
Main class that handles a CLI client. This class is thread safe, but it is not synchronized in such a way to maximize efficiency. This is not an issue because the methods in this class are called at speeds that are determined by user input, and as such high parallelization is not needed.

    • setPlayArea

      public void setPlayArea(String username, List<Position> cardPlacementOrder, Map<Position,BoardCard> field, Map<BoardCard,SideType> activeSides, Set<Position> legalPositions, Set<Position> illegalPositions, Map<ResourceType,Integer> resourceCounts, Map<ObjectType,Integer> objectCounts)
      Description copied from interface: ViewInterface
      Sets the given player's play area.
      Specified by:
      setPlayArea in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      username - The player whose play area is being given.
      cardPlacementOrder - The order in which the cards were played in this play area.
      field - The user's field.
      activeSides - The map keeping track of which side every card is placed on.
      legalPositions - The set of positions on which the player can place cards.
      illegalPositions - The set of positions on which the player must not place cards.
      resourceCounts - A map containing the amount of each resource that the player has.
      objectCounts - A map containing the amount of each object that the player has.

    • playCard

      public void playCard(String username, BoardCard card, SideType side, Position pos, Set<Position> addedLegalPositions, Set<Position> removedLegalPositions, Map<ResourceType,Integer> resourceCounts, Map<ObjectType,Integer> objectCounts)
      Description copied from interface: ViewInterface
      Adds the given card to the given player's play area.
      Specified by:
      playCard in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player who played the card.
      card - The played card.
      side - The card the new card was played on.
      pos - The position where the new card was played.
      addedLegalPositions - The set of new positions in which the player can play a card, following the move which was just made.
      removedLegalPositions - The set of positions in which the player can no longer play a card, following the move which was just made.
      resourceCounts - A map containing the amount of each resource that the player has, following the move which was just made.
      objectCounts - A map containing the amount of each object that the player has, following the move which was just made.

      Specified by:
      signalDisconnection in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      whoDisconnected - The username of the player who disconnected.

    • signalGameSuspension

      public void signalGameSuspension(String whoDisconnected)
      Description copied from interface: ViewInterface
      Tells the client that another client has disconnected, and the game is being suspended as a result to be rejoined later.
      Specified by:
      signalGameSuspension in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      whoDisconnected - The username of the player who disconnected.

    • getDrawOptionAsset

      private CLIText getDrawOptionAsset(PlayableCard card)
      Returns the asset for the front of the given card, or a blank card as a placeholder.
      Parameters:
      card - The card whose asset is needed.
      Returns:
      The requested asset, or a blank card if card is null.

      Returns:

    • scrollView

      public void scrollView(String direction, int offset)
      Scrolls the view of the lastly printed play area.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction in which the play area should be scrolled. Can be either left or right.
      offset - The number of "card lengths" which the play area should be scrolled by.
